ttl.name: SIDE TURN SIGNAL LIGHT ASSEMBLY (for Front Fender)

item.ptxt: Use the same procedure for the RH and LH sides.
The procedure listed below is for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL SIDE TURN SIGNAL LIGHT LENS GASKET LH

s2.ptxt: Wipe off any tape adhesive residue with cleaner.
Using a heat light, heat a new side turn signal light lens gasket LH.

atten4.ptxt: When installing the side turn signal light lens gasket LH, heat the side turn signal light lens gasket LH with a heat light.

entry.ptxt: Side Turn Signal Light Lens Gasket LH

s2.ptxt: Remove the peeling paper from the face of the side turn signal light lens gasket LH.
Install the a side turn signal light lens gasket LH.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL SIDE TURN SIGNAL LIGHT BULB

s2.ptxt: Install the side turn signal light bulb to the side turn signal light socket and wire.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL SIDE TURN SIGNAL LIGHT SOCKET AND WIRE

s2.ptxt: Turn the side turn signal light socket and wire in the direction indicated by the arrow in the illustration to install it.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL SIDE TURN SIGNAL LIGHT ASSEMBLY LH

s2.ptxt: Attach the 2 claws to install the side turn signal light assembly LH as shown in the illustration.
